name: test_NAF_3_4_0_modify_name
description:
Test Case: NAF-55
    As a registered user I can view and update my profile settings
    Scenario: Modify Name
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
    2. Go to "My Profile" button
    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Enter name
    5. Click on "Save" button
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-55
As a registered user I can view and update my profile settings
Scenario: Modify Name

Steps:
1. Open the app, assume the user is logged in
2. Go to "My Profile" button
3. Click on "Edit" button
4. Enter name
5. Click on "Save" button

    3. Click on "Edit" button
    4. Enter name

labels.name: story
labels.value: 3.4.0 As a registered user I can view and update my profile settings
